title: Sustainable methods for the carboxymethylation and methylation of ursolic acid with dimethyl carbonate under mild and acidic conditions
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,16921-16934
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02122C, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Nuttapong Kadsanit, Pattamabhorn Worsawat, Chadamas Sakonsinsiri, Con R. McElroy, Duncan Macquarrie, Pakin Noppawan, Andrew J. Hunt
Carboxymethylation and methylation of ursolic and corosolic acid have been achieved with dimethyl carbonate under sustainable, mild and acidic conditions. The resulting derivatives show potential as novel pharmaceutical intermediates.
